sentences.en: " Doctor,'said India, putting a hand on his sleeve.
sentences.cn: " 大夫,让我进去看她一眼吧, "英迪亚拉着他的衣袖着.

sentences.en: " India,'she whispered, " India, Ashley's -- he's hurt. "
sentences.cn: " 英迪亚, " 她悄悄地说: " 英迪亚, 艾希礼 他受伤了.

sentences.en: " No ,'said India, her pale eyes glittering. " I'm not afraid. "
sentences.cn: " 不怕, " 英迪亚回答说, 她那灰色的眼睛闪出了亮光.

sentences.en: Burma borders on India.
sentences.cn: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.en: But Archie and Melanie and India knew.
sentences.cn: 但是阿尔奇、媚兰和英迪亚是知道的.

sentences.en: China and India all the paper tape was cut into narrow tape.
sentences.cn: 印完的纸带被切成窄的纸带.

sentences.en: I will answer for his appearance ,'said India coldly.
sentences.cn: 我保证让他随传随到, " 英迪亚冷冷地说.

sentences.en: I'll do it with pleasure ,'said India and her eyes glittered.
sentences.cn: "英迪亚说, 眼里也闪出了光亮.

sentences.en: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.cn: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

sentences.en: In spite of the agony of fear there was a note of triumph in India's voice.
sentences.cn: "英迪亚虽然因为担心而痛苦万分,可说话的声音里却带着胜利者的语调.

sentences.en: Licences are still being issued for shipments from India and Brazil.
sentences.cn: 现货市场的价格是长期合同价格的三至四倍.

sentences.en: Look at their hypocrisy, they have defence deal with both India and Pakistan.
sentences.cn: 看看他们的伪善，他们同印度和巴基斯坦都有防卫协议。

sentences.en: Scarlett looked at her in surprise for India was always so self - contained.
sentences.cn: 思嘉看了看她,感到很奇怪,因为英迪亚一向是比较矜持的.

sentences.en: Scarlett stole glances at her companions and intercepted a look from India.
sentences.cn: 思嘉偷偷地看另外几个人,碰巧英迪亚也在看她.

sentences.en: Scarlett was on her feet, furious, facing the coldly blazing India and the imploring Melanie.
sentences.cn: "思嘉也站了起来, 她气愤极了, 眼睛直直地望着冷酷的怒不可遏的英迪亚和在一旁苦苦哀求的媚兰.

sentences.en: There , in the yellow lamplight were Ashley, Aunt Pitty and India.
sentences.cn: 艾希礼 、 皮蒂姑妈和英迪亚坐在昏黄的灯光下.

sentences.en: They slowly migrated westward from northern India about one thousand years ago.
sentences.cn: 现在,他们居住在世界各地,但主要在欧洲.

sentences.en: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.cn: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.en: This would mean that India bought they are partners in international projects.
sentences.cn: 这意味着他们在国际项目是合作关系.

sentences.en: Why no survey about that in India ?
sentences.cn: 为什么不在印度搞调查？

sentences.en: Yes we have to build good quality infrastructure, so any good investment is welcome if its not against interests of India.
sentences.cn: 是的，我们必须修建发达的基础设施，只要不违背印度的国家利益，任何投资都是受欢迎的。

phrases.tran_cn: 英属印度（原为印度的一部分，后分属印度和巴基斯坦）
东印度（指印度，印度支那半岛，马来半岛和马来群岛等）
小印度（新加坡印度族群的聚集地）

trans.tran_en: a republic in the Asian subcontinent in southern Asia; second most populous country in the world; achieved independence from the United Kingdom in 1947
